name: Sarma Simulator
description:
Sarma Simulator is a simulation game where you grow your own plants and meat in order to make Sarma and other food. The objective of the game is to make as much money as possible.

Click on the empty field to plant seeds.

Click on barns to start making meat.

Press the arrow to move between the Farm and the Restaurant.

Press on the Chef in the Restaurant to start cooking.
